name: l8r
description: queue multiple functions and run later
author: Buster Collings <busterc@gmail.com> (https://about.me/buster)

scripts.build: npm install && mkdir -p ./dist && rm -rf ./dist/* && browserify index.js -s L8r -o ./dist/l8r.js && uglifyjs ./dist/l8r.js -c -m -o ./dist/l8r.min.js --source-map ./dist/l8r.min.map --source-map-url l8r.min.map
scripts.test: npm install && npm run lint && tap test.js --coverage-report=text
